summary: I WAS SLOWLY TURNING RIGHT INTO A GAS STATION WHEN MY VEHICLE DIED.  THE STEERING FROZE AND NOTHING WORKED.  THANKFULLY I WAS ABLE TO COAST INTO THE GAS STATION WHERE I PUT THE CAR IN PARK, TURNED IT OFF, AND THEN BACK ON.  IT STARTED FINE.  IF I HAD BEEN ON THE HIGHWAY, I WOULD BE DEAD!!!!  THIS IS INCREDIBLY DANGEROUS!!!!
